title: Generic Conversational Greetings: Hi, Hello, Hey
custom_steps:
WHEN a user speaks either of the following:
- hi
- hello
- hey
custom_expected:
THEN BAMbot should respond with text about its capabilities and what it can do for the user along with three sample questions (sample questions are all interchangeable and can be randomized and different each time). BAMbot replies with the following:

Hi! I'm MLB's voice assistant. I'm here to answer your MLB stats questions. 
OR
Hi! Thanks for letting me help you! I can answer your MLB stats questions.

Try asking me things like:

- "Which player had the most home runs last year?"
- "Which team had the most wins in the National League in 2015?"
- "Which player holds the record for doubles in a single season?"

What can I help you with today?
